text: Francisco Belaúnde Terry (3 October 1923 – 25 August 2020) was a Peruvian politician. He was a member of Congress between 1980 to 1990. He also was President of the Congress between 1980 to 1981. His brother Fernando Belaúnde Terry was President of Peru. Belaúnde died on 25 August 2020 in Lima, aged 96. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Peruvian politicians
title: Francisco Belaúnde
